titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Education and Public Policy Program (EPP)
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Education and Public Policy Program (EPP) FA1682

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-03-13 18:05:23 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Education and Public Policy Program (EPP)

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by file type or originating officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists primarily of program files, office files, project files, and administrative records.
